description: Explore effective strategies for fraud detection and mitigation on Arbitrum, a leading layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum. This in-depth article discusses the use of optimistic rollups, potential vulnerabilities, and solutions such as algorithmic detection, real-time monitoring, and smart contract audits.
keywords: Arbitrum, blockchain security, fraud detection, optimistic rollups, machine learning, real-time monitoring, smart contract audits, decentralized platforms
title: Ensuring Security on Arbitrum: Strategies for Fraud Detection and Mitigation
